name: Cowmets
description:
Hey space cowboy, get on your horsemet, take out your lariat gun and go catch some cowmets!

Be carefull that cowmets are not simple to catch, so you have to chase them down until they stop. Yay!

Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 38: "A Small World"

Twitter | Email

#LDJAM

If you experience any problem, please let me know!
